import React,{useEffect} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row,Col,Image,ListGroup,Card,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import {useDispatch,useSelector } from 'react-redux' import {listProductDetails} from '../actions/productActions' const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(listProductDetails(match.params.id)) },[]) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock >0 ? "In Stock" : "Out Of Stock"} ) } export default ProductScreen
